name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Omaru Poruka Birthday Concert2024!! POL ROCK FES!!!!! [W25VvoWh5zY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka, Mori Calliope, and Ouro Kronii perform '拝啓ドッペルゲンガー' (Haikei Doppelganger) together on stage.
scenes.song_name: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー

scenes.description: Instrumental transition between songs with the audience cheering.
Omaru Polka performs a solo of 'Crow Song' while playing the electric guitar.

subtitles.original: それはずっと続く人の業の連鎖
subtitles.english: It's a continuous chain of human karma.

subtitles.original: 嫌だねって許し合ってみたとて
subtitles.english: Even if we try to forgive each other, saying "I hate it."

subtitles.original: 影でビフテキのペンキをあたしも
subtitles.english: In the shadows, I'm painting with steak sauce too.

subtitles.original: 隠し合って生まれ変わるシミュレーション
subtitles.english: Hiding it all, a simulation of being reborn.

subtitles.original: 僕の方がちゃんと君を生きてやるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll live your life better than you.

subtitles.original: 君の次の誰かちゃんとそこを代わって
subtitles.english: So make sure the person after you takes your place.

subtitles.original: もう分かってるだろ何すればいいかさ
subtitles.english: You already know what you have to do, right?

subtitles.original: 誰か僕に火を付けてくれ
subtitles.english: Someone, set me on fire.

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー 君は誰？
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you?

subtitles.original: あぁこんな風にさ 僕を誰？
subtitles.english: Ah, just like this, who am I?

subtitles.original: もう止まれないや 止まれない
subtitles.english: I can't stop anymore, I can't stop.

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは 君の……
subtitles.english: Hello there, I'm your...

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー それは僕
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, that's me.

subtitles.original: もしもあっちがさ 僕でさ
subtitles.english: If that one over there was me,

subtitles.original: もうあり得ないや 罪はない
subtitles.english: It's already impossible, there's no sin.

subtitles.original: トキシコロジー ねえ……
subtitles.english: Toxicology, hey...

subtitles.original: 狂った世界を染め上げるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll dye this crazy world.

subtitles.original: 幕を上げろよ 乱反射
subtitles.english: Raise the curtain, diffuse reflection.

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは 君の分身です
subtitles.english: Hello there, I'm your alter ego.

subtitles.original:
Crow Song
作詞・作曲:麻枝准
subtitles.english:
Crow Song
Lyrics/Composition: Jun Maeda

subtitles.original: 背後にはシャッターの壁
subtitles.english: Behind me is a shutter wall.

subtitles.original: 指先は鉄の匂い
subtitles.english: My fingertips smell like iron.

subtitles.original: 進め 弾け どのみち 混むでしょう
subtitles.english: Go forward, burst out, it'll be crowded anyway.

subtitles.original: Find way ここから
subtitles.english: Find way, from here.

subtitles.original: Found out 見つける
subtitles.english: Found out, I'll find it.

subtitles.original: Rockを奏でろ
subtitles.english: Play the rock.

subtitles.original: Luckを見据えろ
subtitles.english: Fix your eyes on luck.

subtitles.original: 行き過ぎた デキない街の中
subtitles.english: In a city that's gone too far and can't do anything,

subtitles.original: 星空が最高のご馳走
subtitles.english: the starry sky is the best feast.

subtitles.original: カラスたちがカカと鳴くよ
subtitles.english: The crows are cawing.

subtitles.original: いつも思うよ いつ眠れるんだ
subtitles.english: I always wonder, when can I sleep?

subtitles.original: Find way 私も
subtitles.english: Find way, I too.

subtitles.original: Songを歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing a song.

subtitles.original: Rockを響かせ
subtitles.english: Let the rock resonate.

subtitles.original: Crowを歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing Crow.

subtitles.original: いつまでこんな所にいる
subtitles.english: How long are you going to stay here?

subtitles.original: そういう奴もいた気がする
subtitles.english: I feel like there was someone like that.

subtitles.original: うるさいことだけ言うのなら
subtitles.english: If you're only going to say annoying things,

subtitles.original: 漆黒の羽にさらわれて
subtitles.english: then be swept away by jet-black wings,

subtitles.original: 消えてくれ
subtitles.english: and disappear.

subtitles.original: 全力でもう倒れそうだ
subtitles.english: I'm about to collapse from exhaustion.

subtitles.original: 指もすり切れて痛い
subtitles.english: My fingers are worn out and they hurt.

subtitles.original: でもね やるよ 今夜も ビッグなストーリー
subtitles.english: But you know, I'll do it, tonight too, a big story.

subtitles.original: Find way ここから
subtitles.english: Find way, from here.

subtitles.original: Found out 見つける
subtitles.english: Found out, I'll find it.

subtitles.original: Rockを奏でろ
subtitles.english: Play the rock.

subtitles.original: Luckを歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing luck.
